user.title: Connect to your Niko Connected Controller II
user.description:
Configuring controller **{host}**.

There are 2 ways to authenticate:
1. Activate the 'Niko Hobby API' in the Connected Services through the Niko Home Control programming software.
2. Use a touchscreen profile.

'Niko Hobby API' is the easiest method, but you will need to reauthenticate once a year. Touchscreen profiles can be created in the 'Niko Home Control programming software' under Dashboard â†’ Touchscreens.

confirm.title: Authentication failed
confirm.description:
We could not authenticate with the given credentials.

Probably your Niko Hobby API has expired. Please retrieve a new password via the Connected Services in the Niko Home Control programming software.

Home Assistant will be restarted afterwards.
